name: Get Down!
description:
Instructions:

Try to get down as much as you can, use the ends of the canvas to reach the other ends of the canvas, useful if you're on a platform thats at the edge of the screen, and the lower platforms are in the other side of the screen

Avoid the enemies, jumping on them won't kill them!

Please excuse the bugs!

Controls:

Left: Move Left

Right: Move Right

Z: Jump

Sprites used:

Industrial Tileset
